name: Unity Physics Material 2D File
summary: A PHYSICSMATERIAL2D file is a data asset file used by Unity, a development platform for developing 2D and 3D games. It contains information that describes the friction and bounce physics between 2D objects when they collide in a game. PHYSICSMATERIAL2D files are saved in YAML (YAML Ain't Markup Language) format, which is a human-readable data format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
